CustomField.formula: IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:aws-foundation-v1-5:1') || CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:1') || CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:gcp-foundation:1'), 'Identity and Access Management', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:aws-foundation-v1-5:3'), 'Logging', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:aws-foundation-v1-5:4'), 'Monitoring', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:aws-foundation-v1-5:5') || CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:6') || CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:gcp-foundation:3'), 'Networking', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:5') || CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:gcp-foundation:2'), 'Logging and Monitoring', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:2'), 'Security Center', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:3'), 'Storage Accounts', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:4'), 'SQL Services', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:7') || CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:gcp-foundation:4'), 'Virtual Machines', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:azure-foundation:8'), 'Other Security Considerations', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:gcp-foundation:5') || CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:aws-foundation-v1-5:2'), 'Storage', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:gcp-foundation:6'), 'Cloud SQL Database Services', IF ( CONTAINS(CA10__policyId__c, 'ce:ca:cis:gcp-foundation:7'), 'Kubernetes Engine', null ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Policy Type
